rates.title: Exchange rates
rates.subtitle: Manage currency conversions for your platform
rates.description: Keep your exchange rates current for accurate asset valuations. You can use live market rates or set custom rates for specific currency pairs.

validation.same-as-base: Quote currency must be different from base currency

validation.positive: Exchange rate must be a positive number

what-are-exchange-rates.title: What are exchange rates?
what-are-exchange-rates.description: Exchange rates determine how currencies convert between each other. They're essential for multi-currency platforms to display accurate asset values.

custom-vs-market.title: Custom vs market rates
custom-vs-market.description: Market rates update automatically from financial data providers. Custom rates let you override specific pairs for special pricing or fixed conversions.

sync-frequency.title: How often do rates update?
sync-frequency.description: Market rates refresh every 15 minutes during market hours. You can manually sync anytime, and custom rates remain fixed until you change them.
